attributes.action: ask the National Audit Office to surcharge the Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Labour Party as the present Government have been responsible for over spending and maladministration in direct conflict with its Fiduciary Duty, from the Inland Revenue Computer System, CSA, Air Traffic Control, PFI, Millenium Dome, NHS IT system, ILA's, Sale of Gold Deposits and much more.

The National Audit Office should investigate the totality of the cost to Taxpayers and where the case is proved surcharge the Labour Party and its members for the refund of said monies and where necessary bring Civil or Criminal charges.
